summary.para: Describes the stencil operations that can be performed based on the results of stencil test.

remarks.para: The stencil operation can be set differently based on the outcome of the stencil test by using the StencilFunc member. This can be done for the stencil test portion of depth-stencil testing.
The D3D10_DEPTH_STENCILOP_DESC structure is a member of the structure.

summary.para: A member of the enumerated type that describes the stencil operation to perform when stencil testing fails. The default value is D3D10_STENCIL_OP_KEEP.
A member of the enumerated type that describes the stencil operation to perform when stencil testing passes and depth testing fails. The default value is D3D10_STENCIL_OP_KEEP.
A member of the enumerated type that describes the stencil operation to perform when stencil testing and depth testing both pass. The default value is D3D10_STENCIL_OP_KEEP.
A member of the enumerated type that describes how stencil data is compared against existing stencil data. The default value is D3D10_COMPARISON_ALWAYS.
